about_the_game:
Savage Saturday Cinema: Phantom of the Deep

Trouble Runs Deep! This Savage Saturday Cinema is for one of the mini-settings that came out with
Savage Worlds Adventure Edition: Abyssal! Mason Emmerson dives into the deep end with a tale of the Sea Horses crossing paths with a ghostly submarine, nefarious mercenaries, and glowing sharks. Phantom of the Deep features mystery and family-friendly high adventure in the style of
Johnny Quest and
SeaLab 2020 . Savage Saturday Cinema adventures are designed to have everything you need for a game session (actually playing it on a Saturday night is optional). Characters are provided, but you can make your own. All you need to bring a sense of adventure! "
